author: Emma Roth, Justine Calma
title: Google’s carbon emissions just went up again
description: Google’s carbon emissions jumped yet again as the company continues to push ahead in AI. The company’s 2025 sustainability report emphasizes that its “ambition-based emissions” grew 11 percent last year to reach 11.5 million metric tons of carbon dioxide poll…
content:
The tech giants planet-heating pollution grew 51 percent compared to 2019 as it continues its push into AI.
Googles carbon emissions jumped yet again as the company continues to push ahead in AI. Th… [+2186 chars]
reworded_title:
. Google's carbon emissions are going up again. So do you want to see a drop in the carbon footprint? Absolutely.

And what is the impact of that on your business?

The Carbon Dioxide Reduction Project is a non-profit and we do the research and we do our best to be transparent. We have a lot of different types of carbon pollution and we do some research to try and get people to understand the impact of those different types of carbon emissions.
